leapingtortise.name: Leaping Tortise
leapingtortise.desc: Mossy shelled tortises with very long and powerful hind legs that allow them to make lightning fast lunges at their prey, but make walking slow and akward.

airhorse.name: Glidyer Horse
airhorse.desc: Horses bred for speed and a high affinity for air, making them favored amoung scouts and messengers.

firehorse.name: Blazyer Horse
firehorse.desc: Horses bred for agression and a high affinity for fire, making them favored amoung the high ranking and rich.

waterhorse.name: Rivyer Horse
waterhorse.desc: Horses bred for manuverability and a high affinity for water, making them favored amoung calvary units.

earthhorse.name: Boulyer Horse
earthhorse.desc: Horses bred for stength and a high affinity for earth, making them favored amoung farmers and merchants.
